S1.title: Does Speaker Political Mix Track Twitter Bias?
points: Correlation r = 0.21 between Twitter bias and speaker Dem %
Schools with liberal Twitter bias tend to invite more Dem-affiliated speakers

S2.title: Do Liberal Schools Invite More Democratic Speakers?
points: Liberal schools: 209 Dem vs 96 Rep speakers (69% Dem)
Conservative schools: 24 Dem vs 1 Rep speakers
Clear partisan sorting in speaker selection

S3.title: Who Are the Most Popular Commencement Speakers?
points: High concentration of repeat speakers across schools

S4.title: Has Speaker Political Lean Shifted Over Decades?
points: Note: Classification is heuristic-based; many speakers remain unclassified

S5.title: Do Liberal and Conservative Schools Share Speakers?
points: 361 speakers appeared at both liberal and conservative schools
